name: Frontline Modern Combat Sniper
description:
Front line Modern combat Sniper.
NEW Idea base Game first understand it then play.
front line soldier commando fulfill your command at the same time when you will give your call in the strike.New idea base game ,cal your soldier to shoot your opponent..
Amazing game for its functionality.in the game play you will shoot you enemy and also same time with different angle you can shoot an others enemy by the help of your child soldier or commando.This commando shoot and kill your enemy in the front of you.By the help of this soldier you can save your health and complete the mission.Good graphics and environment.big challenging level.you can really enjoying it.After play this game feedback us with your own reviews...
